General.Name: Mallcom (India) Limited
General.Description: Mallcom (India) Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and distribution of personal protective equipment in India and internationally. The company offers head protection equipment comprising helmet, ear defender, goggles, glasses, masks, single lens, and cap; hand protection gears, such as gloves, latex, nitrile, textile, leather, knitted, cryogenic, and polyurethane gloves; body protection products, such as hi-visibility vest, jacket, workwear, disposable gown for hospital, disposable full sleeves apron, coverall, medical and surgical tunic and plants, and denim trousers and shirts; and feet protection equipment, including safety shoes. The company serves aviation, automobile and auto ancillary, cement and construction, chemical and metal, consumer goods, electronics and IT, food and beverages, hospitality and housekeeping, metal and mining, oil and gas, petrochemical, pharmaceuticals, and shipping industries. It exports its products. Mallcom (India) Limited was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Kolkata, India.
